Sentencas: A compact SOFC power generation system was developed by integrating a 1 kW SOFC stack and balance-of-plant.
Titulo: Development of 1 kW SOFC power package for dual-fuel operation

Sentencas: The system was designed for dual-fuel operation using both natural gas (NG) and liquefied petroleum gas (LPG).
Titulo: Development of 1 kW SOFC power package for dual-fuel operation

Sentencas: An adiabatic pre-reformer was employed in a fuel processing system to convert C2+ hydrocarbons in the fuel into CH4-rich gas which was further processed in a main reformer to produce H-2-rich gas for the SOFC stack.
Titulo: Development of 1 kW SOFC power package for dual-fuel operation

Sentencas: The SOFC system was operated for 350 h under thermally self-sustaining condition, and on-load fuel switching from NG to LPG was carried out during the operation.
Titulo: Development of 1 kW SOFC power package for dual-fuel operation

Sentencas: The system performance was not significantly affected by NG/LPG composition ratios and the performance was stable during continuous operation in NG or LPG.
Titulo: Development of 1 kW SOFC power package for dual-fuel operation
